001package org.biopax.validator;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.ControlledVocabulary;
004
005import java.util.Set;
006
007public interface CvFactory {
008  /**
009   * Gets a normalized BioPAX Controlled Vocabulary by standard (MIRIAM EBI) URI.
010   *
011   * @param <T>  BioPAX ControlledVocabulary type or sub-type
012   * @param uri  recommended URI, e.g., urn:miriam:obo.go:GO%3A0005654 or http://identifiers.org/obo.go/GO:0005654
013   * @param cvClass ControlledVocabulary or sub-class
014   * @param xmlBase biopax model xml:base (URI namespace prefix for generated CV objects)
015   * @return controlled vocabulary object
016   */
017  <T extends ControlledVocabulary> T getControlledVocabulary(String uri, Class<T> cvClass, String xmlBase);
018
019  /**
020   * Lookup for a CV of given class by ontology (name, synonym, or URI)
021   * and accession (ID) or term name/synonym.
022   *
023   * @param <T> BioPAX ControlledVocabulary type or sub-type
024   * @param db  OBO ontology name, synonym, or URI (e.g., "Gene Ontology", "go",
025   *            "urn:miriam:obo.go", or "http://identifiers.org/obo.go/")
026   * @param id  term's accession number (identifier) or name/synonym
027   * @param cvClass ControlledVocabulary or sub-class
028   * @param xmlBase biopax model xml:base (URI namespace prefix for generated CV objects)
029   * @return the controlled vocabulary or null (when no match found or ambiguous)
030   */
031  <T extends ControlledVocabulary> T getControlledVocabulary(String db, String id, Class<T> cvClass, String xmlBase);
032
033  //controlled vocabulary terms hierarchy methods
034
035  Set<String> getDirectChildren(String urn);
036
037  Set<String> getDirectParents(String urn);
038
039  Set<String> getAllChildren(String urn);
040
041  Set<String> getAllParents(String urn);
042
043  boolean isChild(String parentUrn, String urn);
044
045}
